img_text: Steve Atkinson 1ONews 26 mins C Violence at the border tonight. San Diego Sector Chief Rodney Scott of the U.S. Customs and Border Protection was giving a tour to CBP Commissioner Kevin McAleenan when someone on the south side of the border wall near Friendship Park threw a large rock at the Commissioner, narrowly missing him according to CBP Our Anthony Pura is there tonight with the full story on #10Newsat11
